name: System F. Mount Remote Disk
description:
**Mount Remote Disk**  
 . 
 **List Disk (cifs and nfs):** lists the available share in the net 
 **Select IP Server:** select the server ip 
 **Type of sharing:** selects the type of cifs (samba) or nfs share 
 **Options:** are a comma delimited list of mount options. Ref. mount man pages: ([**CIFS**](https://linux.die.net/man/8/mount.cifs)) ([**NFS**](https://linux.die.net/man/5/nfs)) - ex. **vers=1.0** | **vers=2.0** | **vers=3,nolock** | **vers=2.0,gid=50** | etc 
 **Type share directory:** Type the directory of the server you want to mount (exact name) 
 **Type mount folder:** Give a name to the , it is free and of your choice (ex. Musicnas, Film_nas1, Music_loss_nas, Music1, Music2, etc.) 
 **Username:** enter username if required by the server, otherwise leave guest 
 **Password:** enter password if required by the server, otherwise leave NULL 
 **Enable at boot:** select enable if you want to mount the disk at boot time, otherwise leave blank 
 . 
 .
